oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Frosh versus Sophs
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Students; Hazing; Hats
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The end of "worming," the time during which Freshmen were required to wear derbies, culminated in a touch football game between the Freshmen and the Sophomores. A Sophomore win meant that the Freshmen had to continue wearing derbies for an additional two weeks. Paul Buscemi (in the derby) was the Freshman captain; Harrigan Wortsmith captained the Sophomores. They are accompanied by Ellen McGuire, a student from Siena College. The Freshmen lost 30-6.
